title: How Section 230 came to be | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Law professor Jeff Kosseff explains the long history of Section 230, the law that made the modern internet possible.

itunes:subtitle: A quarter-century after it was signed, Section 230, the law that made the modern internet, has done the impossible: united Democrats and Republicans.
